languages.text: {n}Вопрос застает Кибеллу врасплох.{/n} "Я... Второй ткач культа. Копье в дланях Неумирающего. Твоя тень, и щит, и клинок".
{n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."
languages.original_text: {n}Вопрос застает Кибеллу врасплох.{/n} "Я... Второй ткач культа. Копье в дланях Неумирающего. Твоя тень, и щит, и клинок".

languages.text: {n}Tu pregunta parece coger por sorpresa a Kibellah.{/n} «Yo... soy la Segunda Tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta. Una lanza en las manos del Emperador Inmortal. Soy su escudo y su sombra. Su espada».
languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu pregunta parece coger por sorpresa a Kibellah.{/n} «Yo... soy la Segunda Tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta. Una lanza en las manos del Emperador Inmortal. Soy su escudo y su sombra. Su espada».

languages.text: {n}あなたの質問は、キベラの意表を突いたようだ。{/n}「私は…ブラッドスパン・ウェブの第二の織り手。不死の皇帝が手にする槍。私はあなたの盾であり、影。そしてあなたの刃」
languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの質問は、キベラの意表を突いたようだ。{/n}「私は…ブラッドスパン・ウェブの第二の織り手。不死の皇帝が手にする槍。私はあなたの盾であり、影。そしてあなたの刃」

languages.text: {n}你的问题似乎让绮贝菈惊讶不已。{/n}“我是……织血罗网的次席织网者，不死神皇手中的利矛。我是你的坚盾，你的影子，你的利刃。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的问题似乎让绮贝菈惊讶不已。{/n}“我是……织血罗网的次席织网者，不死神皇手中的利矛。我是你的坚盾，你的影子，你的利刃。”

languages.text: {n}Deine Frage scheint Kibellah zu überraschen.{/n} "Ich bin ... die Zweite Spinnerin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Ein Speer in den Händen des Todlosen Imperators. Ich bin Euer Schild und Schatten. Eure Klinge."
languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Frage scheint Kibellah zu überraschen.{/n} "Ich bin ... die Zweite Spinnerin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Ein Speer in den Händen des Todlosen Imperators. Ich bin Euer Schild und Schatten. Eure Klinge."

languages.text: {n}Votre question semble prendre Kibellah au dépourvu.{/n} « Je suis... la deuxième tisseuse de la Toile de Sang. Une lance dans la main de l'Empereur immortel. Votre bouclier et votre ombre. Votre lame. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."

languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."

languages.text: {n}Sorduğun soru, Kibellah'yı gafil avlamış gibi duruyor.{/n} "Ben... Kanipi Ağı'nın İkinci Dokuruyum. Ölmeyen İmparator'un elindeki mızrağım. Senin kalkanın ve gölgenim. Kılıcınım."
languages.original_text: {n}Your question seems to take Kibellah by surprise.{/n} "I am... the Second Spinner of the Bloodspun Web. A spear in the hand of the Undying Emperor. I am your shield and shadow. Your blade."
